ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype.segments
Class SpiralSegment

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype.segments.StretchableSegment
      ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype.segments.SpiralSegment

public class SpiralSegment
extends StretchableSegment

A spiral segment. Draws appropriates curves around the circular backbone. Intended to be used with a circular backbone. Usable with a linear backbone, but will be very wasteful when drawing a straight line.

Author:
Eric Marinier
